src:
Tak Dapat Hadiah Penalti, Real Madrid Keluhkan VAR
03 Nov 2019, 19:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid lewat salah satu petinggi mereka, Emiliano Butragueno mengeluhkan penggunaan VAR dalam laga melawan Real Betis di Santiago Bernabeu, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari tadi.
Dalam laga ini, para pemain Real Madrid sempat meminta hadiah penalti kepada wasit ketika umpan silan Karim Benzema dari sisi kiri mengenai tangan pemain Betis, Zou Feddal pada menit-menit akhir babak kedua.
Namun setelah berkonsultasi dengan tim VAR, wasit Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez memutuskan untuk tidak memberi penalti kepada Real Madrid.
text:
No Penalty Prizes, Real Madrid Complain about VAR
Nov 03 2019, 19:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid through one of their top brass, Emiliano Butragueno complained about the use of VAR in the match against Real Betis at the Santiago Bernabeu, Sunday (11/03/2019) early this morning.
In this match, Real Madrid players asked for a penalty from the referee when Karim Benzema's cross from the left struck Betis, Zou Feddal in the final minutes of the second half.
But after consulting with the VAR team, referee Jose Maria Sanchez Martinez decided not to give a penalty to Real Madrid.
